plot outline: Vaare Vah movie is all bout 'What Women Want'. The rare gift in the protagonist is a moment of happiness to audience but to all the women characters in the film including his better half it is a baffling moment. That is Adesh Deshpande (Komalkumar). He has a lady boss, grandmother and mother pester him and he is not getting a good match to marry.
title: Vaare Vah
plot: _Vaare Vah_ (qv) movie is all bout 'What Women Want'. The rare gift in the protagonist is a moment of happiness to audience but to all the women characters in the film including his better half it is a baffling moment. That is Adesh Deshpande (Komalkumar). He has a lady boss, grandmother and mother pester him and he is not getting a good match to marry.
